channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: Financial services veteran named president of BofA Sarasota-Manatee
item.description: Bank of Americahas namedStephenie Whitfield, Business Banking market executive, president ofBank of America Sarasota-Manatee. She succeedsErik Vatter, who led the market since 2022 and will focus on his new role as Merrill senior financial adviser.

item.title: Walking the rightsizing walk, part 2: How I stopped hyperventilating
item.description: Now that my husband, DC, and I had sold the Happier Yellow House to the first buyer who saw it, we were quite suddenly, technically, homeless. Yeep! My head was literally spinning. I need to sit down often and put my head between my knees.

item.title: Walking the rightsizing walk, part 3: 8 items to get rid of for sure
item.description: I am so embarrassed. All these columns and books I have written on downsizing and decluttering and my oh my, the mess I am in. Moving is the ultimate truth test. As I pack up the house my husband, DC, and I have lived in for eight years, box towers line the halls, packed and stacked like big city skylines. Each room coughs up its contents like a kid with consumption. I fear I may never see a clear counter again.

item.title: Stretch your summer at Florida’s best spas and wellness escapes
item.description: Labor Day may mark the unofficial end of summer, but in Florida, the heat and the chance for indulgence between hurricanes linger long after the last backyard barbecue. For those not ready to trade flip-flops for fall, the state’s top spas and wellness spaces offer one more excuse to savor summer.

item.title: Sarasota Orchestra welcomes new music director to lead after 5 years
item.description: After five years without a music director, the Sarasota Orchestra is welcoming a new artistic leader.

item.title: As government shutdown looms, here's how Florida could be impacted
item.description: Much of the federal government isset to shut downOct. 1 unless Congress extends the current funding authority. Depending on how long the shutdown lasts,significant effects could be feltin Florida.

item.title: Your guide to the 2025 Sarasota, Manatee high school…
item.description: From preseason practices through the state championship games, theHerald-Tribunewill be covering the high school football season every step of the way.

item.title: Vote for Sarasota, Manatee 2025 Midseason Volleyball…
item.description: The halfway point of the Sarasota-Manatee high school volleyball season is upon us. As we head into the second half of the season, we selected Lakewood Ranch High player Ava Collins as our Midseason Player of the Year.

item.title: Sign up for 2025 hurricane season text message updates…
item.description: September has so far seen the development of hurricanes and severalother tropical systemswe're watching now.

item.title: Top 5 concerts this week in Sarasota, Manatee counties
item.description: We say farewell toSeptemberand enter October this week, and you'll find notable shows across both months in this latest concert picks installment. We start with a contemporary Christian musician who's earned 60 Dove Awards, five Grammys and induction into the Grand Ole Opry, visiting Sarasota while on tour celebrating the recent 25th anniversary of one of his most popular albums.

item.title: Riverview, Booker, Palmetto, Venice football win big in…
item.description: A roundup of Manatee and Sarasota county high school football games played Thursday, Sept. 25, and Friday, Sept. 26.

item.title: World War II hero, one of last Tuskegee Airmen, dies at Sarasota home
item.description: World War II hero Lt. Col. George Hardy, the youngest of the Tuskegee Airmen pilots who fought during the war and helped pave the way for the integration of the armed forces, hasdied at his Sarasota home at age 100.

item.title: Game Balls for Week 5 top Sarasota, Manatee high school football performers
item.description: Sarasota and Manatee area teams lit up the scoreboard in decisive wins across Week 6. There were several players who made that happen.

item.title: Florida hurricane forecast: What to expect from future Tropical Storm Imelda
item.description: Tropical Depression Nine will strengthen into Tropical Storm Imelda and move north-northwest through the Bahamas this weekend, far enough offshore to have marginal weather impacts on Florida’s East Coast.

item.title: Popular national burger restaurant chain to make Sarasota area debut
item.description: Afterpreviously revealing plans for a Sarasota location, a popular national fast-food burger chain now has a new area restaurant confirmed to be in the works, as part of a major new development in Bradenton.
